rooms.description: Spacious living area designed with Bohemian decor, featuring natural textures and vibrant colors. Open concept to promote energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.
Modern yet Bohemian kitchen with open layout and natural materials. The south-west corner placement is preferred for good energy circulation.
Dining area integrated with the living space. The east side placement helps in harnessing morning light, enhancing Vastu compliance.
Private gym designed with functional equipment and ample space for workout routines, incorporating Vastu principles by ensuring an unobstructed energy flow.
Bohemian studio apartment bedroom with multifunctional design, including a workspace and sleeping area. The north side placement is ideal for relaxation and positive energy.
Compact yet functional bathroom, designed with natural materials. Its placement ensures privacy and complies with Vastu.

openings.description: Entrance placed in the north-east to welcome positive energy, aligning with Vastu principles.
Large windows throughout the open spaces to allow natural light and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Balcony for outdoor relaxation, ensuring fresh air circulation and a connection with nature.
